thread.title_full: Army veteran, hangs flags at a Veterans Affairs facility | Daily Mail Online

author: Forrest Hanson For Dailymail.Com
title: Army veteran, hangs flags at a Veterans Affairs facility | Daily Mail Online
text: Army veteran, 74, faces criminal charges and up to six months in jail for hanging flags at a Veterans Affairs facility Robert Rosebrock, 74, hung two flags on a fence at a Los Angeles VA facility Was protesting VA treatment of homeless veterans and has done so since 2008 Faces criminal charge filed under Obama admin and up to 6 months in jail 1973 VA order states that individuals may only place materials on VA property with permission Caseworkers are hoping the Trump administration will drop the charges Published: 05:51 GMT, 25 February 2017 | Updated: 06:22 GMT, 25 February 2017 20 shares
